esri-inc.name: Esri
esri-inc.html:
Esri (Environmental Systems Research Institute) is a software company best known for its ArcGIS products. With a 43% market share, Esri is the world's leading supplier of GIS software, web GIS and geodatabase management applications.

Esri provides online mapping software for free to K-12 (from kindergarten to 12th grade) (learm more), have built a community of GeoMentors and also is been used in many leading colleges and universities prepare students for meaningful careers in GIS and advance our understanding of global systems and societies through GIS education (more info).
